Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video shows the first Islamic call to prayer in Spain in 500 years, as it is actually a video from Azerbaijan.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to support the assertion that it is the first Islamic call to prayer in Spain in 500 years.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that there was a ban on adhan in Spain in recent times, which is not true.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the video was taken in Azerbaijan and has nothing to do with Spain.
